channel.title: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
channel.description:
[request] Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
Since no one has made dynamic sigs for GunZ users, besides that one guy that you need to email, I figure I can use my skills to help. :) A lot of people play GunZ, so it should turn out good.
Credit will of course go to the person who has developed the image.
This image needs the following: - Sufficient area for Ranking, Game ID, Level, Experience Points, Kill, Death, Kill/Death Percent. - In small print, shows your name (since you made the image) and mine (Ron) on the bottom right. - One (or several) really sick background(s). - .PNG file since .GIF files have their disadvantages in color, right?
I can do this part. :) - Compress the .PNG file using PNGCrush or w/e program you use so the size of the file isn't huge and doesn't kill the servers. - Code everything.
If anyone is willing to do this, my heart will soar. :D
~Ron

item.title: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

If you choose one, don’t choose the international version, its always in beta because it doesn’t run very well and it has more hackers in it than the India version(9/10 people in India GunZ hack)

item.title: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Here is the first stat signature. I’m using the default fonts.
http://goons.freepgs.com/FUN/gunz_stats_grabber.php?user=ronthecon&pic=true&clan=YabbaDabbaDoo

I really wanted to show the rank!

MybBob, yea… cool suggestion but sorry man but that font wouldn’t mesh with the rest of the stat signatures. Look for something more vibrant… more… sexy.

xharveyx, thanks for that really sweet site! It has a lot of great fonts, I’ll look through and see what I can find.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:18, topic:129143”]In GunZ, people don’t care about the number of kills and deaths, they care about the percent. I kinda doubt they care about the exp either. All they care about is:

Rank
Name
Level
k/d ratio
clan(If they have a clan)

You don’t need to add so much to it ;)[/quote]

OK I won’t split it then, but I will keep the Kill/Death % like this: 100/100 (50%)

XharveyX:

Mines on the attachment. I haven’t added the writing but you can do that =P

Nice sig man! Hmmm, I’ll use mspaint for the writing (jk). lol.

I was thinking of writing the stats of the GunZ users in a some cool font. Do you guys know what font would be good for your signatures? Because I would like to use all your signatures. or should I just use the regular gd font and just make it big and white so it’s clearly visible?

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

In GunZ, people don’t care about the number of kills and deaths, they care about the percent. I kinda doubt they care about the exp either. All they care about is:

Rank
Name
Level
k/d ratio
clan(If they have a clan)

You don’t need to add so much to it

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!

item.title: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Wow those look wonderful! But one problem is that I can’t get the clan name from the gunz.ijji.com website. Here is an example username.
http://gunz.ijji.com/ranking/individual.nhn?searchField=charname&searchText=arcangel23

If anyone knows how I can get the clan name when searching for a Game ID, please tell me. Otherwise I’ll just set another GET var, and you can input your own Clan Name right from the signature URL.

Oh and yes exps, a variety would be wonderful! Please make sure to include your name in the stat signature! Those signatures look very nice. Should I split the Kill/Death Percent to Kill, Death, and Percent so it’s separate? I already did it, but I could change it back.

By the way, here is the gunz stats page which I will turn into a picture. Right now it’s just text. Look at the URL and you can see that you can input the clan name.
http://goons.freepgs.com/FUN/gunz_stats_grabber.php?user=arcangel23&clan=MooCow

~Ron

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for sweet GunZ background to make stat sigs!
